name: MLUpdateContext
desc: The context an update task provides to your app’s completion and update progress handlers.

items.name: var event: MLUpdateProgressEvent
items.desc: The event type that triggered an update task to notify your app’s completion and update progress handlers.

items.name: struct MLUpdateProgressEvent
items.desc: A type of event during a model update task.

items.name: var task: MLUpdateTask
items.desc: The update task that generated the update context.

items.name: var parameters: [MLParameterKey : Any]
items.desc: The parameters for the update task.

items.name: class MLParameterKey
items.desc: The keys for the parameter dictionary in a model configuration or a model update context.

items.name: var metrics: [MLMetricKey : Any]
items.desc: The training metrics of the model for the update task, contained in a dictionary.

items.name: class MLMetricKey
items.desc: A key for the metrics dictionary in an update context.

items.name: var model: MLModel & MLWritable
items.desc: The underlying Core ML model stored in memory.

items.name: protocol MLWritable
items.desc: A set of methods that saves a machine learning type to the file system.
